mapper.select: SELECT A1.PH_MEET_TITLE, A1.PH_MEET_SUBTITLE , A3.U_NAME AS PH_MEET_WRITER , TO_CHAR(A1.PH_MEET_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEET_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(A1.PH_MEET_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEET_END_dATE , A1.PH_MEET_CONTENT , TO_DATE(A1.PH_MEET_DATE) AS PH_MEET_DATE , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(A1.PH_MEET_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') IS NULL THEN '최종 수정일자 없음' ELSE TO_CHAR(A1.PH_MEET_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS MEET_UPDATE_DATE , TO_DATE(A1.PH_MEET_DATE) AS MEET_DATE FROM ( SELECT PH_MEET_TITLE, PH_MEET_SUBTITLE , U_P_APPLY_CODE , PH_MEET_START_DATE , PH_MEET_END_DATE , PH_MEET_CONTENT , PH_MEET_DATE , PH_MEET_UPDATE_DATE FROM PH_MEET WHERE U_P_APPLY_CODE IN ( SELECT P3.U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P P1, P_POSITION P2, U_P_APPLY P3, P_REJECT P4 WHERE P1.P_CODE = ( SELECT T3.P_CODE FROM U_P_APPLY T1, P_POSITION T2, P T3 WHERE T1.U_P_APPLY_CODE = #{u_p_apply_code} AND T1.P_POSITION_CODE = T2.P_POSITION_CODE AND T2.P_CODE = T3.P_CODE ) AND P1.P_CODE = P2.P_CODE AND P2.P_POSITION_CODE = P3.P_POSITION_CODE AND NOT P3.U_P_APPLY_CODE = P4.U_P_APPLY_CODE ) ORDER BY PH_MEET_CODE DESC ) A1, U_P_APPLY A2, U A3 WHERE A1.U_P_APPLY_CODE = A2.U_P_APPLY_CODE AND A2.USER_CODE = A3.USER_CODE
